text: Nandao nimen de qian ren de xiaoxi meiyou daoda nimen ma? Ji nu ha de zuren, a de ren he sa mu de ren, yiji zai tamen zhihou de renmen, wei an la zhidao tamen. Zhexie ren de shizhemen yi daizhe mingzhengdaoda tamen, dan tamen que ba shouzhi shen ru kouzhong [yin fennu er yao shouzhi] shuo:“Women buxinyang nimen suo bei paiqian de shiming, fanshi nimen suo zhaohuan women de [ru xinfeng yisilan jiao], women que shi zai jiaolu de huaiyi zhong.”
